mapper.select: select * from noticeboard order by nb_idx desc limit #{start}, #{perpage}
mapper.insert: insert into noticeboard (m_state, nb_subject, nb_content, nb_photo,nb_writeday) VALUES (#{m_state},#{nb_subject},#{nb_content},#{nb_photo},now())
mapper.update: update noticeboard set nb_readcount=nb_readcount+1 where nb_idx=#{nb_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT m.m_nickname FROM noticeboard nb JOIN member m ON nb.m_state = m.m_state WHERE nb.nb_idx = #{nb_idx}
